Date: Thursday, 2/2/1990
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of Gary Carter.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Wednesday, 4/5/1990
Subject: Felix Fermin learns new position
Felix Fermin has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "6" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Rafael Belliard
Dear Sir,
Rafael Belliard has an AVG of .208 at AA Huntsville Stars!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of John Flaherty
Dear Sir,
John Flaherty has an AVG of .447 at A Carolina Mud Cats!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Jerry Brooks
Dear Sir,
Jerry Brooks isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Huntsville Stars!
He has an AVG of .202, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Brian Barnes
Dear Sir,
Brian Barnes has an ERA of 2.79 at A Carolina Mud Cats!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Felix Fermin
Dear Sir,
Felix Fermin shouldn't play at AA Huntsville Stars!
He has an AVG of .211 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director

in my last year of the contract.

Regards,
John Henry Johnson
